name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto Refresh and Scroll For Service Titan Dashboard

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate your ServiceTitan Dispatch Board: auto-click Today, smart scroll, zoom to 150%, and focus the timeline on 7 AM-4 PM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Title: Efficient Dispatch Board Navigation

Short Description: Enhance your ServiceTitan Dispatch Board experience with streamlined navigation and automated scrolling features.

Full Description:

Take control of your ServiceTitan Dispatch Board with our specialized extension designed to improve your workflow efficiency. This content script automatically handles several key tasks, allowing you to focus on what's important:

    Automatic Button Click: Automatically clicks the "Today" button on your Dispatch Board to keep you up to date with the latest schedules.
    Smart Scrolling: Seamlessly scrolls to the top or middle of the page based on the alarm you set, ensuring youâ€™re always viewing the most critical information.
    Zoom Adjustment: Adjusts your page zoom to 150% for optimal readability and viewing comfort.
    Timeline Focus: Automatically scrolls the timeline to show work schedules between 7 AM and 4 PM, putting the most relevant hours front and center.

This extension operates in the background, kicking in as soon as the Dispatch Board is fully loaded. Whether you're refreshing manually or working on a set schedule, this tool keeps your screen aligned with your needs.

Features:

    Streamlined navigation with automatic "Today" button clicks
    Smart scrolling to focus on key parts of the page
    Customizable timeline view from 7 AM to 4 PM
    Automatic zoom adjustment for improved readability

Install now to experience a more efficient and user-friendly ServiceTitan Dispatch Board!
